subject: Randomly Ordered Repeating Test Suite
msgSnippet: Is there a addon available that will take a set of tests, and run them repeatedly in a random orders until failure (or forcibly stopped). I ve got one tests
messageBody:
Is there a addon available that will take a set of tests, and run them
repeatedly in a random orders until failure (or forcibly stopped).

I've got one tests which fails sporadically, and I cannot figure out any
reason for it to be non-deterministic in MY code. I've added some
logging statements, but It's hard to get to fail.

David
